name: test create file with empty filename

steps.name: Check that response status code equals to <HTTPStatus.UNPROCESSABLE_CONTENT: 422>
Check create file response with empty filename
Check that lenght of details actual to 1
Check that name equals to 'String should have at least 1 character'

parameters.name: actual
